2014770.name: SteamTopia
2014770.description:
SteamTopia is set in a steampunk enviroment with steam powered machines and gadgets.

In this world where the money and power come first, the player must expand more and more with powerful machinery and make the most of resources available.
For that, automation is key, everything must be automated, from resource gathering, to their processing and selling.

However, automation alone won't take you far. The villagers of SteamTopia are helpful and eager to buy and sell the best products to thrive through the journey.

Automation

Trough the game you will have the opportunity to automate the collection and crafting of most items and resources available in SteamTopia, tranforming worthless raw resources into complex items.

Magic

Thanks to ancient and mysterious magic, amazing things can be done in SteamTopia, like Portals, that allow to transport items (and yourself) between dimensions.

Combat

With the engineering and magic of the steampunk era an arsenal of weapons is available to make your enimies fear you. This vary from simple and sweet swords and crossbows to complex rifles and revolvers.

NPCs

The village of SteamTopia is full of characters to meet that may have quests for you in trade for gold or help in the progress of the story of the game.

Multiplayer

Automating alone is fun, but everything is better with friends, in SteamTopia you can play CO-OP multiplayer, both local and through the internet.
2014770.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
